high_descs: Turn to your right and walk forward a few steps, then turn back to your left and go to the end of the desk, where it meets the wall.
Pick up the pencil in the middle of the desk, between the clear bowl and the keys.
Move over to your right, so that you are directly in front of the books on the desk.
Place the pencil in front of the books that are directly behind the glass bowl, on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Move a pencil on the desk over.

high_descs: turn right, walk a few steps, turn left, walk towards the wall, turn left to face desk
pick up the pencil that is on the desk
turn around, take a step, turn right, take a step, turn right to face desk
put the pencil next to the dish on the desk
anns.task_desc: move pencil from one side of desk to the other

high_descs: Turn right, head to the desk
take the pencil from the desk
turn around, take a few steps to the right, face the desk
Put the pencil on the desk
anns.task_desc: Take the pencil from the desk, put it on the other side of the desk
